title: Ruanglaptop AI
description: Ruanglaptop AI the no.1 Indonesian-based startup specializing in academic content writing. We scan documents, search the web, and write everything for you in a few clicks. The company was founded in late 2023, and the AI writing tool was released for public use one year later. Currently serving thousands of happy (and paying) customers across the globe. Number is growing with no sign of stopping.
